lines.gurmukhi: jYsy eyk cItI pwCY kot cItI clI jwiq; iek tk pg fg mig swvDwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as millions of ants follow the path blazed by an ant, walk on it very attentively without faltering a step;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs Bwˆq iek kIVI qy ipCy ipCy kRoVwˆ hI kIVIAwˆ qurIAwˆ jwXw krdIAwˆ hn qy iek tk iek swr iek pYr folnoˆ Enwˆ dy swvDwn rihMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kUMj pwiq BlI BwNiq swNiq shj mY; aufq AwkwscwrI AwgY Agvwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as cranes fly in a disciplined formation very cautiously in peace and patience and all of them are led by one crane;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs pRkwr kUMjwˆ dI fwr shj shj hOlI hOlI SwˆqI pUrbk BlI pRkwr suMdR FMg nwl AYn AwpxI ikqwr bdI AMdr rihMdI hOeI AwkwS cwrI AwkwS mwrg ivKy aufI jwXw krdI hY qy Agy aus dw Agvwn AgvwnI krxhwrw huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy imRgmwl cwl clq tlq nwih; jqR qqR AgRBwgI rmq qq iDAwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a herd of deers never stagger from their sharp march following their leader and all proceed so very attentively,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs Bwˆq imrgwˆ dI fwr cwl AwpxIAwˆ cOkVIAwˆ BrIˆdI clI dI hI clI jwdI hY qy bMd nhIˆ Ar jqR ijDr nUM AgRBwgI rmq Es fwr dw AwgUAw j`Qydwr rmdw cOkVI Brdw cldw hY qqR iqsy hI pwsy nUM qq iqs swrI fwr dw DÎwn rihMdw hY; Bwv swrI fwr dI fwr hI jIkUM Awpxy AgUey dI Anuswirqw ivc cldI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kItI Kg imRg snmuK pwCY lwgy jwih; pRwnI gur pMQ Cwf clq AigAwn hY [413[

Unknown.translation: Ants, cranes and deers keep following their leader, but supreme leader of all the species who leaves the well defined path of the True Guru, is surely a fool and a highly ignorant person.  (413)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr siqgurU dy Gr BI AgUey dI AgvwnI ivc clx dI mRXwdw hY so jd kIVI Awid jIv jMqU kUMj Awid pMKI qQw ihrx Awid pSUAwˆ vrgy ijs nUM Apxy snmuK rihx hwrw AgUAw Qwp lYˆdy hn qwˆ Pyr Es dy sdw ip`Cy hI lgy jwXw krdy hn; pr auh pRwnI mnu`K jo gurU dy pMQ nUM Awpxw klÎwx dwqw hox qy BI C`f qurdy ies qoˆ bymuKqw Dwrdy hn; eyho hI mhwn AgÎwn = bysmJI hY ]413]
